SELECT a.id, a.login_name, a. NAME, a.del_flag, c. NAME AS "company.name", o. NAME AS "office.name" FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_franchisee c ON c.id = a.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role d ON a.id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role e ON d.role_id = e.id WHERE a.del_flag = 0
AND o.id = #{office.id} AND (e.enname = '400kf' or e.enname = 'yy93') ORDER BY o. CODE, c. CODE, a. NAME
